physical_examinations.relevant_findings: General: Alert, oriented, no acute distress, moves comfortably around the room. Abdomen: Soft, tenderness to palpation in epigastrium with voluntary guarding, abnormal contour noted in epigastrium, bowel sounds present, no organomegaly.
